text: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْحَمْدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلْأَرْضِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Then, to Allah belongs [all] praise - Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka bagi Allah-lah segala puji, Tuhan langit dan Tuhan bumi, Tuhan semesta alam.
